thig3.7:4.2: so what will seclusion do for you?
thig3.7:4.3: Enjoy the delights of sensual pleasure;
thig3.7:5.1: “Sensual pleasures are like swords and stakes
thig3.7:5.2: the aggregates are their chopping block.
thig3.7:5.4: is now no delight for me.
thig3.7:6.1: Relishing is destroyed in every respect,
thig3.7:6.2: and the mass of darkness is shattered.
